page.title: 11LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Dyce {police station}was opened in 1981 after being closed for 12 years during which it was used as a house. The station was reopened because of the needs of the growing community. The police are involved mainly with {vandalism, theft and housebreaking. {The police told us that most of these {crimes are committed by people under {19 years of age. There are 3 people employed at the police station and it is open for 8 hours a day. There are no cells in the station. Cases are passed on to the large police station at Bucksburn. Between 1990-1995 the police station will grow in size and will be open 24 hours a day with a larger staff.
